summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the development of a Mobility Plan to replace the central waterfront portion of the Alaskan Way Viaduct; directing the Seattle Department of Transportation to develop a Mobility Plan; providing principles for the development and implementation of the Mobility Plan; lifting a budget proviso restricting the use of funds; and reducing and reappropriating with limitations certain appropriations in the 2007 Budget.
sponsor: STEINBRUECK, CO-SPONSORS CLARK, CONLIN, DRAGO, LICATA
